# Winged Arrows (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 feet + 10 feet/level)

**Target:** One creature/level

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 80

Those affected by this spell ignore range penalties for their first two range increments on all ranged weapon attacks as barely perceptible wings carry aloft their loosed arrows, bolts, spears, and so forth. Attacks made within the first range increment gain a +2 insight bonus.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 1 and Ranger 1 to Level.
